item.title: Getting Started ... Again
item.description: Hello to Everyone Reading This, It’s been quite a while since I last penned anything down. The last memory I have of writing was during my GRE’s Analytical Writing Assessment (AWA) — ah, the good ol’ days! But let’s set the jokes aside for a moment. I used to write articles and courses for The Click Reader for over a year. However, after moving on from Click Reader, my writing habits took an unexpected hiatus.
